result.arabic_text: فَلَا تَحۡسَبَنَّ ٱللَّهَ مُخۡلِفَ وَعۡدِهِۦ رُسُلَهُۥٓۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَزِيزٞ ذُو ٱنتِقَامٖ
result.translation: Ntumwa y’Imana! Ntukiyumvire ko Imana Allah Ica kubiri n’isezerano Yahaye Intumwa zayo, ryo kuzishikana ku ntsinzi no guhonya abazihakana. Mu vy’ukuri Imana Allah, ni Nyenintsinzi-Mutaneshwa, Izokwihora bikwiye abansi ku musi w’izuka[13];
result.footnotes: [13] Iyi Aayah, n’aho itumbereye Intumwa (nyakugira amahoro n’impuhwe z’Imana Allah), ariko inyigisho irimwo iraba abislamu bose.
